short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends native messages to Azentio Twain Control for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Process and scan documents, of TWAIN compatible scanner devices, and send the data as Base64 string to the provided URL. It can scan documents and images as single page or from feeder.
